sentences.en: ‘I’m going now,’ she said, fastening her coat.
sentences.cn: “现在我要走了。”她一边说，一边扣上大衣。

sentences.en: Builders must fasten down roofs of newly-built homes more securely.
sentences.cn: 建造工人必须把新建房屋的屋顶固定得更牢靠些。

sentences.en: Do not fasten all the windows up while you sleep.
sentences.cn: 睡觉时不要将所有的窗户都关紧.

sentences.en: Don't fasten the responsibility on him.
sentences.cn: 不要把责任推到他身上.

sentences.en: Fasten onto what the official broadcasting station is saying.
sentences.cn: 注意官方电台是怎么说的.

sentences.en: Fasten the horse to the tree.
Fasten these sheets of paper together with a clip, please.
sentences.cn: 请用回形针将这些纸别在一起.

sentences.en: It'sa gross over-simplification to fasten on to the red deer as a threat to the environment.
sentences.cn: 仅关注马鹿威胁环境的一面过于片面了。

sentences.en: Keep still while I fasten shoe.
sentences.cn: 站着别动,我给你系鞋带.

sentences.en: Make sure all the windows are securely fastened before you leave.
sentences.cn: 离开前要确保所有的窗子都已关严。

sentences.en: The dressmaker used a pin to fasten the pattern to the cloth.
sentences.cn: 裁缝用大头针把纸样别在布料上.

sentences.en: What can I use to fasten on this clip?
sentences.cn: 我用什么才能将这个夹子固定好?。

sentences.en: When you sew up to this end, fasten off the thread.
sentences.cn: 当你缝到这头时, 把线打个结.

trans.tran_cn: 扣牢，关紧，使牢固，系上，抓牢，盯住
trans.tran_en: to attach something firmly to another object or surface
to join together the two sides of a coat, shirt, bag etc so that it is closed
to firmly close a window, gate etc so that it will not open, or to become firmly closed
